concept.title: Introduction to DitaCraft
concept.shortdesc: DitaCraft is a comprehensive Visual Studio Code extension for editing and publishing DITA content.

section.title: What is DitaCraft?
section.p: DitaCraft is the easiest way to edit and publish your DITA (Darwin Information Typing Architecture) files directly from Visual Studio Code. It provides a complete authoring environment with:

ul.li: LSP-powered IntelliSense with auto-completion, hover docs, and document symbols
Full DTD validation with three engine options
Smart navigation with Ctrl+Click on href, conref, keyref, and conkeyref
Cross-file Go to Definition, Find References, and Rename
Key space resolution for keyref and conkeyref
Live HTML5 preview with bidirectional scroll sync
XML formatting with code actions and quick fixes

section.title: Key Features
section.p: DitaCraft offers the following key features:

dlentry.dd: Context-aware auto-completion for DITA elements, attributes, and values. Hover documentation for 364+ elements. Document outline and workspace symbol search.
Ctrl+Click on href, conref, keyref, and conkeyref attributes to navigate directly to referenced content. Cross-file Go to Definition, Find References, and Rename.
Real-time validation with three engine options: built-in (default), TypesXML (full DTD), and xmllint. LSP-powered diagnostics for instant feedback as you type.
Side-by-side HTML5 preview with bidirectional scroll sync, theme support, and print mode.
Publish to HTML5, PDF, EPUB, and more with direct DITA Open Toolkit integration.
Full IntelliSense for DITAVAL conditional processing files including element completion, attribute values, and action keywords.
Interactive tree view showing your DITA map hierarchy with navigation support.

section.title: Supported File Types
section.p: DitaCraft supports the following DITA file types:

strow.stentry: Book-oriented maps with chapters and parts

section.title: Version Information
section.p: This guide covers DitaCraft version 0.5.0, which includes:

ul.li: LSP server with IntelliSense, diagnostics, and navigation
Cross-file Go to Definition, Find References, and Rename
XML formatting with code actions and quick fixes
Improved key space resolution with better root map discovery
cSpell auto-prompt for spell checking setup
